thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: VMware Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $1.09

author: Reuters Editorial
title: VMware Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $1.09
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - VMware Inc:
* VMWARE REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL YEAR 2018 RESULTS
* Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.68
* Q4 REVENUE ROSE 14 PERCENT TO $2.31 BILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.62, REVENUE VIEW $2.26 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* LICENSE REVENUE FOR Q4 WAS $1.07 BILLION, AN INCREASE OF 20% FROM Q4 OF 2016
* VMWARE - Q4​ ‍GAAP RESULTS INCLUDE ESTIMATED NET TAX EXPENSE RECOGNIZED IN CONNECTION WITH ENACTMENT OF TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT OF $970 MILLION Source text for Eikon:
